title: Archaeology Data Infrastructures
text:
Preface
It is created in open-source Quarto scientific and technical publishing system.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
See Zhang, Zhao, and Ventrella (2018) for additional discussion of literate programming.




Zhang, Shaozeng, Bo Zhao, and Jennifer Ventrella. 2018. “Towards an Archaeological-Ethnographic Approach to Big Data: Rethinking Data Veracity.” Ethnographic Praxis in Industry Conference Proceedings 2018 (1): 62–85. https://doi.org/10.1111/1559-8918.2018.01197.

title: 2  Theory and Method
text:
2.2 Theorizing data
Defining archaeological data, micro- to macro-scales;

title: 2  Theory and Method
text:
2.3 Methodological Approaches
Review of current approaches: Spatial and/or Landscape archaeology, Macroarchaeology,Big data archaeology etc.

title: 3  Data
text: Data models, datafication of past reality, simple vs complex data models; Assessing findability, accessibility, interoperability, and reusability (FAIR) principles; Cultural heritage management data vs research data domains; Archaeological information system of the Czech Republic (AIS CR) as the main data infrastructure.

title: 5  Summary
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.

title: References
text:
